channel.title: Weapons Overpowered with leeches!
channel.description:
If all leaches are on, weapons such as AGS/Claws and all the other rare weapons hit over 90+ Which as you know is unrealistic.
Is there anyway i can stop people from using all the prayers at once?
I know i can just go into item.cfg and change all the power of the weapons, but then that makes them very weak when on there (without prayer)
Any suggestions?

item.title: Weapons Overpowered with leeches!
item.dc:creator: @NumberEleven NumberEleven
item.description:
@NumberEleven wrote:

Thanks bro, im just worried, then the weapons will become shit!

Read full topic

item.title: Weapons Overpowered with leeches!
item.dc:creator: @Apollo_man Apollo man
item.description:
@Apollo_man wrote:

Honestly changing on cfg would be the best way.

“Hit the sweet spot” - literally.

Keep changing until you get in perfect. That’s my advice really.

Read full topic
